title: Dwarven Thrower
content: Dwarven Thrower Very Rare 3~12 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8)+2 Bludgeoning Homing Weapon: This weapon will return to its owner when thrown. Shocking Bound: A dwarf throwing this warhammer deals an extra 1d8 Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large, Huge, or Gargantuan creature, the strike deals an additional 2d8 Bludgeoning damage.
